description: The Black Diamond Alpenglow Pro Hoody offers ultimate sun coverage as well as water resistance for mountain missions with unpredictable weather. Featuring UPF 50+ fabric, they’ve also added GTT's revolutionary Empel™ Technology, an environmentally friendly PFC-free water-repellant finish that is superior in performance compared to any other C-6, C-8, or C-0 DWR. The Alpenglow Pro also sports a ¼ zip opening for regulating body temperature, HeiQ Pure underarm mesh panels for extra breathability, a concealed chest pocket, thumb-loops, and an over-the-helmet compatible hood, making this hoody an essential layer from the desert to the alpine.
name: Black Diamond Alpenglow Pro Hoody - Mens

specs.value: Nylon stretch jersey with Empel DWR finish - 92% Nylon, 8% Elastane, 158 g
